name: Allison Of Astra: Allison's Scribble Quest (S1 E1)
name_original: Allison Of Astra: Allison's Scribble Quest (S1 E1)
description:
The first season of the world's first serialized NES game begins here! Join Allison, the multiverse's greatest treasure hunter (at least that's what she told us) as she explores the hills and valleys of Scribbletown.

Take Allison home to play on the NES, or on anything that can emulate the NES. And watch for more....new episodes will be released monthly!

Try before you buy: play the browser version here!
